targets.query: from(bucket: "ics") |> range(start: -15m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "anomalies" and r.sensor_id == "S1" and r._field == "anomaly_score") |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: max)
from(bucket: "ics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "anomalies" and r._field == "anomaly_score") |> sort(columns:["_time"], desc:true) |> limit(n:20)
